ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] DANCE Anyone ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Songer!  Welcome to the bard community. Unfortunately other than the MALE *cough* bards ability to dance while playing a flute the only way we have of
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Songer! Welcome to the bard community.

Unfortunately other than the MALE *cough* bards ability to dance while
playing a flute the only way we have of dancing is by useing creative
socialing

My "Dance" is: /dance /shiv /blee /point
Looks kind of 70's but at least it's not just jumping up and down on my
tiptoes :)

Only males get the dance animation when playing a flute. Us female bards
just stand there and blow on it while waggling our head back and forth.

**sighs**

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
*dance impaired*
----- Original Message -----
From: "Bill Tong" <biltong88@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 12:29 AM
Subject: [eqbards] DANCE Anyone ?


> Hi Everyone ,
>
> I am new to this mailing list and have only recently
> started to play a bard after my characters made it to
> level 50.
>
> I started a newbie bard because I can remeber one day
> while hunting SG's in Oasis - I saw a bard defeat a SG
> without the SG laying a hand on him.
>
> This intrigued me as my 50 Ranger has to tank, kite
> and use a lot of brain power to take down an SG and it
> takes well over 10 minutes to kill one solo.
>
> Well - I do digress ( bard character is affecting me
> already ) the question I wanted to ask was - DO WE
> DANCE.
>
> Many people come up to me and ask me to dance because
> they can see I am a bard ( flashing lights etc. ) I
> then do a kind of dance that involves walking
> backwards ( moonwalking type thing ) coupled with a
> few other moves. But I really doubt if this is Bard
> Dancing.
>
> I have seen the anim of the Male bard that looks kind
> of like a Pied Piper jumping on eggs when the male
> bard plays the flute. I can only assume this is the
> dancing that people are talking about.
>
> Do we have another DANCE anim ?
>
>
> Laters,
> Songer.
>
>
>
